definitions: A member of the class of animals Aves in the phylum Chordata, characterized by being warm-blooded, having feathers and wings usually capable of flight, and laying eggs.
A girl or woman, especially one considered sexually attractive.
A chicken; the young of a fowl; a young eaglet; a nestling.
To observe or identify wild birds in their natural environment.
To seek for game or plunder; to thieve.
